sentences.sContent: The gutters were blocked and overflowing.
sentences.sCn: 排水沟堵住了，水都溢出来了。

sentences.sContent: Instead of ending up in jail or in the gutter he was remarkably successful.
sentences.sCn: 他最后不但没有坐牢或流落贫民窟，反而还非常成功。

synos.tran: 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的

remMethod.val: gut(肠胃， 引申为“沟”) + ter → 街沟

trans.tranOther: the low part at the edge of a road where water collects and flows away
